owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

new_owner.description: The username or organization name the repository will be transferred to.

new_name.description: The new name to be given to the repository.

team_ids.description: ID of the team or teams to add to the repository. Teams can only be added to organization-owned repositories.
